arabic_text: مُهۡطِعِينَ مُقۡنِعِي رُءُوسِهِمۡ لَا يَرۡتَدُّ إِلَيۡهِمۡ طَرۡفُهُمۡۖ وَأَفۡـِٔدَتُهُمۡ هَوَآءٞ
translation: (43) Racing ahead, their heads raised up, their glance does not come back to them,[663] and their hearts are void.
footnotes: [663]- This is their state at the time of resurrection from the graves.  Their heads are upraised in fixed stares of terror, unable even to glance back.
